text: Changing MainActivity to SingleTask that we did last week to fix the weird two-homescreen bug that Adam saw, is causing us to not close the home screen when the nfc action is used :disappointed:

I’m going to remove singleTask on the HomeActivity for the build today, because I think that the nfc button working correctly is more important. It occurs a lot more frequently. At this point, I’m not sure how to fix the original bug, but I’m going to reintroduce it for this build, most people won’t see it anyway
